name: DiFuMo Atlas (256 dimensions)
description: DiFuMo (Dictionary of Functional Modes) 256-dimensional atlas presents a parcellation of the brain into 256 elementary structures using sparse dictionary learning. The atlas contains two main components: (1) an image of the 256 spatial components, sampled in MNI space, and (2) anatomical names for these 256 regions. It is meant to serve as an atlas to extract functional signals, eg to create image-derived phenotypes. These modes are optimized to represent well raw BOLD time series, over a with range of experimental conditions.
